Frequency once per day

Requirements Your most recent action was to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Tumble Through], and you successfully moved through an enemy's space

Effect Make a melee unarmed Strike against the enemy whose space you moved through. On a hit, the target takes @Damage[1d6[persistent,poison]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1} (or takes @Damage[2d6[persistent,poison]] and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2} on a critical hit).
